annual.name: Earned / Privilege Leave
annual.encashment: As per company policy and applicable labor laws

sick.name: Sick Leave
sick.documentation: Medical certificate may be required for leave exceeding 2 consecutive days
sick.carryForward: Up to a maximum limit as defined by management

casual.name: Casual Leave
casual.restrictions: Maximum of 2 consecutive days can be taken as CL

maternity.name: Maternity Leave
maternity.eligibility: As per the Maternity Benefit Act, 1961 (India)
maternity.benefits: Up to 26 weeks of paid maternity leave

applicationProcess.advance: Leave requests must be applied through the prescribed leave management system or via email (if applicable)
applicationProcess.approval: Subject to reporting manager approval and project requirements
applicationProcess.documentation: Medical certificate may be required for sick leave exceeding 2 consecutive days

policies.compensation: Comp-Off may be granted if an employee works on a weekly off or declared holiday
